website_summaries.verdict: One rustic bench option with a few hidden secrets and features. Excellent storage space.
pros: Built-in storage space underneath the bench is large enough for several small-to-medium size objects
cons: Impractical to rearrange or transport on a regular basis

customer_reviews.title: Dented! TWICE!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and it was dented. I sent it back and got it again, dented again. I kept it this time because AFTER I read reviews, I realized a lot of people returned it for the same reason. It is strong enought to sit on but the bottom is paper thin and it will come dented... one could only hope it is dented in teh back. In a nutshell... I would not buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: jodi

customer_reviews.title: Love it, but........
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews before I purchased this storage bench. I was aware that some said it came dented or broken. I ordered it anyway because I liked it so much. Mine did not come dented, BUT one latch was completely broken. I just decided to take it off instead of sending it back. I think it is much sturdier than what other reviewers said. In fact, my husband is able to sit on it comfortably to put his socks on. I was able to pack quite a few blankets and extra things inside.
customer_reviews.author: DLVB

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this bench ! so adorable nice and sturdy ,bring a nice rustic touch to the room
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Heit

customer_reviews.title: Handle broke off while unwrapping
customer_reviews.text: I really love this piece. I bought it for my bedroom to store my pillows in when they’re not on my bed, so the fact that the lid stays open on it’s own is perfect since I have a few European pillows, I'm only giving it a 3 because as I was taking the plastic off one of the handles broke off. I’m not even sure how it was connected because there are no screws or holes, and there doesn’t appear to be any broken welding marks. The metal piece is bent up like it was never properly secured.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Castro

customer_reviews.title: Just the right size and look!
customer_reviews.text: I was so worried about receiving a dented bench, but took the risk. It arrived in great condition. Make sure you measure. It is a little small to be a bench used on a regular basis for seating, such as a dining room bench at a table, but perfect for what I needed. From a distance (maybe 5 feet away or more) it looks fantastic and high end. As you get closer, you can tell the rust is manufactured and not necessarily authentic. But only to someone really looking. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: K. S.

customer_reviews.title: Stunningly perfect, but dents easily...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect. I LOVE this storage bench. It has so much storage space and the look fits my decor perfectly. The only downside is that it dents easily. There’s a dent in it currently from shipping but it’s hardly noticeable. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Janelle

customer_reviews.title: Farmhouse Table/Storage!
customer_reviews.text: This metal bench is Awesome! Although I'm using it as a center table for my farmhouse decor; it is also perfect to store seasonal pillows. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Oscar Fdz.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Super disappointed in this. It came damaged -hinges bent and falling off, the box was demolished when it arrived so impossible to return. The benches measurements listed are also not accurate and is much smaller in person , shorter than an average chair height and not deep enough to sit on comfortably
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice storage solution
customer_reviews.text: We don't have any closets or cabinets in our tiny home and seating in the living room is limited so this killed 2 birds with one stone for us. We now have a proper place to store our shoes and provides comfortable seating for when we have extra company. I've had so many compliments on it! We do have pets who enjoy sitting on it to see out the window, but unfortunately their claws have snagged the clear plastic protection layer over the seat. For the price I wish it we're a little bit more durable but still very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Staci Elliott

customer_reviews.title: I love the look and functionality!
customer_reviews.text: I was afraid the fabric wouldn't coordinate with my couch, but it looks really good! One of the three hinges broke as soon as I opened the lid the first time. I am deciding whether or not to send it back....is it worth the hassle? For the price, I probably should make them make it right! Overall I'm happy with the product!
customer_reviews.author: Melanie F.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with dents and latches do not line up properly.
customer_reviews.author: Christi Garrison

customer_reviews.title: So it so different.
customer_reviews.text: No assemble. I just love it. And I have 8king size blankets in it.
customer_reviews.author: D.Mill2

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, Moreno than I expected. Love the extra storage. Also more sturdy than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Ira

customer_reviews.title: Unique and versatile
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Super cute and unique. Can be used as searing or coffee table and is functional storage space.
customer_reviews.author: kaila

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: After getting the first one, I ordered another! It looks great and is easy to move. If you are looking for a heavy duty bench to stand on, do not order. It is farm chic and light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Sher

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to our room
customer_reviews.text: Came assembled. We love it. We use it to store toddlers toys and double as a foot rest/ottoman to our couch.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie Wojciehoski

customer_reviews.title: Do not pay for installation it is all put together!
customer_reviews.text: We love it! Going to order another one for our den. Plenty of storage and matches are rustic decor!
customer_reviews.author: laura a fruchey

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cute, however came bent. When closed the lid doesn't match up with bottom. Not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dented
customer_reviews.text: Came very dented. If it weren’t pre-dented, it would be 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Love this piece! It looks beautiful in front of my bed.
customer_reviews.author: Michelene Maurer

customer_reviews.title: 🙌
customer_reviews.text: I would have given a 5-star except for the fact that the latch sometimes will scrape you when you sit on the bench
customer_reviews.author: crystal

customer_reviews.title: dented
customer_reviews.text: There is a dent on the front of the bench right in the middle between the latches. Big disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Heiny

customer_reviews.title: It's the rustic piece I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Not giving this a full 5 stars because it did have dents, but I'm not sending it back because it's part of the rustic & it's not really obvious. The latches don't ease the access to the storage area. I'm going to most likely end up removing them.
customer_reviews.author: L. Graisbery

customer_reviews.title: Perfect addition to my home
customer_reviews.text: I have had my eye on this for a year. Saw it on other sites but amazon was the cheapest. Shipping was great. I use mine as a bench by the front door. Kids have sat on it and it did ok. Not really ment for an adult to sit on, even to put their shoes on. I love it though!
customer_reviews.author: Suzy Homemaker

customer_reviews.title: Unique and versatile!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and son-in-law are renovating their barn home and this looks just great in their family room. Gave it to them for Christmas. Extra storage, (with three littles, a must!) can be used as extra seating, an ottoman or serving tray.. They love it!
customer_reviews.author: Ret

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I really love this storage bench. The storage space is incredible and it is absolutely beautiful. Goes perfect in my cottage home.
customer_reviews.author: Gia Jury

customer_reviews.title: Will come dented.
customer_reviews.text: If the product didn’t come damaged, I would have given it 4 stars. I should have listened to those that offered a warning in their reviews. Came with a huge dent in the front that won’t pop out. So far my furniture purchase from Amazon are 2 bad out of 3.
customer_reviews.author: Hollie

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product- Shouldn't have plastic covered padding.
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice product, but the padding of the bench is covered in plastic. It looks much better if removed, we did have to unscrew the stop to remove the plastic entirely.
customer_reviews.author: A. EGNOT

customer_reviews.title: Watch out for damage.
customer_reviews.text: couldn't wait to receive the item. It arrived quickly in a damaged box and the entire left side was banged up and dented inward. I will return for a new item that is not damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Grammy2006

customer_reviews.title: I love it. It arrived dented
customer_reviews.text: I love it. It arrived dented, so I received some $ back...which was appreciated. Even with dent, I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: First don’t need to assemble (don’t pay to assemble)! It is beautiful in my liveroom!!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia  Kitice

customer_reviews.title: Unique Piece
customer_reviews.text: Loved this! Unique and exactly as pictured. Arrived in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Summer78

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, looks great, holds a ton. Worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, looks great, holds a ton. Worth the price! Might buy a second one because we have tons of race tracks and toddler hockey sticks that I dont want covering the floor all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Wong

product_meta.title: Deco 79 60966 METAL AND FABRIC STORAGE BENCH, Kamia 4-Tier Shoe Rack, Rustic Gray
product_meta.description: Deco 79 60966 Farmhouse Style Horse Watering Trough Silver Iron Storage Bench with Beige Cotton Cushioned Seat, Farmhouse Entryway Bench, Farmhouse Living Room Furniture with Home Storage, 50” x 18” Product description (optional) : A Farmhouse decor essential, this large yet lightweight rectangular storage bench with seating is made of sturdy silver iron with decorative rust detail and a comfortable light beige cushion top in a woven cotton fabric. Both accent furniture and home storage, this metal bench is easy to move around by its iron swing handles that also offer a stylish touch and match the rim of the seating and latches. Once open, you’ll find ample interior storage, and when closed, you have versatile and stylish Farmhouse decor and comfortable bench seating with a cozy 18” seat height. This makes a great entryway bench, living room furniture under a window, and any space with a Farmhouse style look for additional hidden home storage. Neutral silver and beige work with any color palette.
feature_bullets: Styled after horse watering troughs, this metal bench is ideal for farmhouse-inspired settings with its hammered finish, rust accents and distressing, engraved vertical line pattern, neutral tones, and metal construction; seat top is cotton fabric in a light beige color
Offers comfortable seating and convenient storage options in its 3-section hollow interior; iron swing handles and latches allow for easy transport and security
Iron construction with MDF seat base provides durability; entire storage bench measures 50” x 18” 16” and weighs 38.7 lbs.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars64 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
